'''Töla''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|A boisterous woman with a long, sun-burned nose motions you to approach. Her eyes droop half-closed, and the stench of liquor wafts off of her.}}
Töla is a Principi agent with a fondness for drink, she is currently arranging a joint operation with the RDC against VTC adra convoys.

## Interactions

|wares           =

|rest            =

|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Dirty Laundry](/dirtyLaundry/): Her meeting with Quarno is of interest to Director Castol.
